section.title: How to Locate the Log File and the Log Configuration File
section.p: To locate the Log file where the logs are written, or the Config file used to configure logging, go to the Administration Page, and in the General tab, you can view the location of these files.

section.title: Enabling HTTP Request Logging for Debugging
section.p: To enable a detailed logging of the HTTP requests sent by , edit the file listed as the Config file in the Administration Page, and add the following lines:log4j.category.org.apache.http.impl.conn=debug log4j.category.org.apache.http.impl.client=debug log4j.category.org.apache.http.client=debug log4j.category.org.apache.http.headers=debug

Making changes to this file requires that you restart the applicationrestart the application.After you finish your debugging session, remember to revert this configuration file back to its original content to avoid performance issues.

section.title: How to Configure Logging Using a System Property
section.p: You can enable logging by setting the following system property:-Dlogging.level.ro.sync=debug
